lines.text: Potential difference in a parallel circuit

secText: Your challenge is to use a voltmeter and your knowledge of circuits to determine the emf of the battery, the current I in the outer loop, and the resistance of the R3 bulb.

In the simulation, the voltmeter can be placed in the circuit to determine the potential difference across two points of the circuit. However, you cannot use the voltmeter to directly determine the emf of the battery (because that would be too easy!).
